00055 // _tWinMain - Defines the entry point to your application (Chapter 5 - page 126)
00056 //
00057 // The GameCode2() method handles the heavy lifting of your game's
00058 // initialization, entry into the main loop, and cleanup.
00059 // _tWinMain is defined here because GameCode2 is inside a LIB file.
00060 //========================================================================

00062 
00063 INT WINAPI _tWinMain(HINSTANCE hInstance,
00064                      HINSTANCE hPrevInstance,
00065                      LPTSTR    lpCmdLine,
00066                      int       nCmdShow)
00067 {
00068         return GameCode2(hInstance, hPrevInstance, lpCmdLine, nCmdShow);

00078 //
00079 // VCreateGameAndView - Chapter 5 page 145 (single player)
00080 // VCreateGameAndView - Chapter 19, page 744 (teapot wars multiplayer)
00081 //
00082 BaseGame *TeapotWarsGameApp::VCreateGameAndView()
00083 {
00084         BaseGame *game = NULL;
00085         assert(m_pOptions && _T("The game options object is uninitialized."));
00086         if (m_pOptions->m_gameHost.empty())
00087         {
00088                 game = GCC_NEW TeapotWarsGame(*m_pOptions);
00089         }
00090         else
00091         {
00092                 game = GCC_NEW TeapotWarsGameProxy(*m_pOptions);
00093 
00094                 EventListenerPtr listener ( GCC_NEW NetworkEventForwarder( 0 ) );
00095                 extern void ListenForTeapotGameCommands(EventListenerPtr listener);
00096                 ListenForTeapotGameCommands(listener);
00097 
00098         }
00099 
00100         shared_ptr<IGameView> gameView(GCC_NEW TeapotWarsGameView());
00101         game->VAddView(gameView);
00102 
00103         return game;
00104 }

00107 //
00108 // TeapotWarsGameApp::VLoadGame                         - Chapter 19, page 745
00109 //
00110 bool TeapotWarsGameApp::VLoadGame()
00111 {
00112         // Ordinarilly you'd read the game options and see what the current game
00113         // needs to be - or perhaps pop up a dialog box and ask which game
00114         // needed loading. All of the game graphics are initialized by now, too...
00115         return m_pGame->VLoadGame("NewGame");
00116 }

00124 //
00125 // class TeapotWarsEventListener                        - Chapter 19, page 752
00126 //
00127 class TeapotWarsEventListener : public IEventListener
00128 {
00129 public:
00130         
00131         explicit TeapotWarsEventListener( TeapotWarsGame *teapotWars ) : m_TeapotWars(teapotWars) { };
00132         virtual ~TeapotWarsEventListener() { };
00133         char const * GetName(void) { return "TeapotWarsEventListener"; }
00134         bool HandleEvent( Event const & event );
00135 
00136 private:
00137         TeapotWarsGame *m_TeapotWars;
00138 };
00139 
00140 //
00141 // TeapotWarsEventListener::HandleEvent         - Chapter 19, page 753
00142 //
00143 const float g_WeaponForce = 15000.0f;
00144 bool TeapotWarsEventListener::HandleEvent( Event const & event )
00145 {
00146         if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_Remote_Client::gkName)==0)
00147         {
00148                 EvtData_Int *sockId = event.getDataPtr<EvtData_Int>();
00149 
00150                 NetworkGameView *netGameView = GCC_NEW NetworkGameView(sockId->GetValue());
00151                 shared_ptr<IGameView> gameView(netGameView);
00152                 m_TeapotWars->VAddView(gameView);
00153 
00154                 extern void ListenForTeapotViewEvents(EventListenerPtr listener);
00155 
00156                 EventListenerPtr listener ( GCC_NEW NetworkEventForwarder( sockId->GetValue() ) );
00157                 ListenForTeapotViewEvents(listener);
00158         }
00159 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00160         else if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_PhysObjCollision::gkName)==0)
00161         {
00162                 EvtData_PhysCollision *ed = event.getDataPtr<EvtData_PhysCollision>();
00163                 shared_ptr<IActor> pGameActorA = m_TeapotWars->VGetActor(ed->m_ActorA);
00164                 shared_ptr<IActor> pGameActorB = m_TeapotWars->VGetActor(ed->m_ActorB);
00165                 if (!pGameActorA || !pGameActorB)
00166                         return false;
00167                         
00168                 std::string typeA = pGameActorA->VGetType();
00169                 std::string typeB = pGameActorB->VGetType();
00170 
00171                 //hardcoding string names like this next line is BAD, in case you were wondering
00172                 if(     "Sphere"==typeA && pGameActorA->VGetID().valid() )
00173                 {
00174                         // post press - it was a mistake to send a destroy actor event here....
00175                         if("Teapot"==typeB && pGameActorB->VGetID().valid())
00176                         {
00177                                 m_TeapotWars->VRegisterHit(*pGameActorA->VGetID(), *pGameActorB->VGetID());
00178                         }
00179                         m_TeapotWars->VRemoveActor(*pGameActorA->VGetID());//get rid of the sphere
00180                 }
00181                 if(     "Sphere"==typeB && pGameActorB->VGetID().valid() )
00182                 {
00183                         // post press - it was a mistake to send a destroy actor event here....
00184                         if("Teapot"==typeA && pGameActorA->VGetID().valid())
00185                         {
00186                                 m_TeapotWars->VRegisterHit(*pGameActorB->VGetID(), *pGameActorA->VGetID());
00187                         }
00188                         m_TeapotWars->VRemoveActor(*pGameActorB->VGetID());//get rid of the sphere
00189                 }
00190         }
00191         else if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_Thrust::gkName)==0) 
00192         {
00193                 EvtData_Thrust * evtData = event.getDataPtr<EvtData_Thrust>();
00194                 shared_ptr<IActor> pActor = m_TeapotWars->VGetActor(evtData->m_id);
00195                 if( pActor )
00196                 {
00197                         static const float newtonForce = 500000;
00198                         float thrustForce = evtData->m_throttle * newtonForce;
00199 
00200                         Mat4x4 rotation = pActor->VGetMat();
00201                         rotation.SetPosition(Vec3(0,0,0));
00202                         Vec3 dir = rotation.Xform(g_Forward);
00203                         dir.Normalize();
00204                         m_TeapotWars->m_pPhysics->VApplyForce(dir, thrustForce, evtData->m_id);
00205                 }
00206         }
00207         else if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_Steer::gkName)==0) 
00208         {
00209                 static const float newtonForce = 500000 * 1.8f;
00210 
00211                 EvtData_Steer * evtData = event.getDataPtr<EvtData_Steer>();
00212                 float steerForce = evtData->m_dir * newtonForce;
00213                 m_TeapotWars->m_pPhysics->VApplyTorque(Vec3(0,1,0), steerForce, evtData->m_id);
00214         }
00215         else if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_Fire_Weapon::gkName)==0)
00216         {
00217                 ActorId gunnerId = event.getDataPtr<EvtData<ActorId> > ()->GetValue();
00218 
00219                 shared_ptr<IActor> pGunner = m_TeapotWars->VGetActor(gunnerId);
00220                 if (pGunner)
00221                 {
00222                         // TODO: You should check his stores of ammo right here!!!
00223 
00224                         //Calculate depth offset from the controller
00225                         Vec4 at = g_Forward4 * 2.0f;
00226                         Vec4 atWorld = pGunner->VGetMat().Xform(at);
00227 
00228                         //Calculate up offset from the controller
00229                         Vec4 up = g_Up4 * 1.5f;
00230                         Vec4 upWorld = pGunner->VGetMat().Xform(up);
00231 
00232                         Vec4 direction = atWorld + upWorld;
00233                         Vec3 normalDir(direction);
00234                         normalDir.Normalize();
00235 
00236                         SphereParams sp;
00237                         sp.m_Pos = pGunner->VGetMat().GetPosition() + Vec3(direction);
00238                         sp.m_Radius = 0.25;
00239                         sp.m_Segments = 16;
00240                         sp.m_Color = g_Cyan;
00241                         optional<ActorId> cannonBall = m_TeapotWars->CreateSphere(sp);
00242                         if (cannonBall.valid())
00243                         {
00244                                 m_TeapotWars->m_pPhysics->VApplyForce(normalDir, g_WeaponForce, *cannonBall);
00245                         }
00246                 }
00247         }
00248 #endif 
00249         else if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_Move_Actor::gkName)==0) 
00250         {
00251                 EvtData_Move_Actor *evtData = event.getDataPtr<EvtData_Move_Actor>();
00252                 m_TeapotWars->VMoveActor(evtData->m_Id, evtData->m_Mat);
00253         }
00254 
00255         return false;
00256 }

00258 //
00259 // TeapotWarsBaseGame::VLoadGame                        - Chapter 19, page 746
00260 //
00261 bool TeapotWarsBaseGame::VLoadGame(std::string gameName)
00262 {
00263         std::string command = "LoadGame " + gameName;
00264         if (gameName=="NewGame")
00265         {
00266                 VBuildInitialScene();
00267                 safeTriggerEvent(Evt_New_Game());
00268         }
00269 
00270         VChangeState( BGS_WaitingForPlayers );
00271 
00272         return true;
00273 }

00278 //
00279 // TeapotWarsBaseGame::VRemoveActor                     - Chapter 19, page 747
00280 //
00281 void TeapotWarsBaseGame::VRemoveActor(ActorId aid) 
00282 { 
00283         BaseGame::VRemoveActor(aid); 
00284         m_data.RemoveActor(aid);
00285         safeQueEvent(EventPtr(GCC_NEW Evt_Destroy_Actor(aid)));
00286 }
00287 
00288 //
00289 // TeapotWarsBaseGame::VAddActor                        - Chapter 19, page 747
00290 //
00291 void TeapotWarsBaseGame::VAddActor(shared_ptr<IActor> actor, ActorParams *p)
00292 {
00293         BaseGame::VAddActor(actor, p);
00294         if (p->m_Type==AT_Teapot && p->m_Id.valid())
00295         {
00296                 m_data.m_actorScores[*p->m_Id] = 0;
00297         }
00298 }

00308 //
00309 // TeapotWarsGame::TeapotWarsGame                       - Chapter 19, page 748
00310 //
00311 TeapotWarsGame::TeapotWarsGame(GameOptions const &options)
00312 : TeapotWarsBaseGame(options)
00313 , m_Lifetime(0)
00314 , m_StartPosition(3.0f, 3.0f, 3.0f)
00315 , m_RenderDiagnostics(false)
00316 {
00317 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00318         m_pPhysics.reset(CreateGamePhysics());
00319 #endif 
00320 
00321         EventListenerPtr teapotWarsEventListener ( GCC_NEW TeapotWarsEventListener ( this ) );
00322         safeAddListener( teapotWarsEventListener, EventType(Evt_Remote_Client::gkName) );
00323 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00324         safeAddListener( teapotWarsEventListener, EventType(Evt_PhysObjCollision::gkName) );
00325 #endif 
00326         safeAddListener( teapotWarsEventListener, EventType(Evt_Destroy_Actor::gkName) );
00327         safeAddListener( teapotWarsEventListener, EventType(Evt_Move_Actor::gkName) );
00328 
00329         extern void ListenForTeapotGameCommands(EventListenerPtr listener);
00330         ListenForTeapotGameCommands(teapotWarsEventListener);
00331 }
00332 
00333 
00334 //
00335 // TeapotWarsGame::~TeapotWarsGame                      - added post press
00336 //
00337 // This destructor must be called to remove all the actors from the actor list.
00338 // If we rely on the BaseGame class to do that, the virtual chain is broken and the
00339 // VRemoveActor method that gets called is BaseGame::VRemoveActor, which doesn't 
00340 // remove the actor from the game data or physics, causing memory leaks.
00341 //
00342 TeapotWarsGame::~TeapotWarsGame()
00343 {
00344         while (!m_ActorList.empty())
00345         {
00346                 ActorMap::iterator i = m_ActorList.begin();
00347                 ActorId aid = (*i).first;
00348                 VRemoveActor(aid);
00349         }
00350 }
00351 
00352 
00353 //
00354 // TeapotWarsGame::VOnUpdate                    - Chapter 19, page 749
00355 //
00356 void TeapotWarsGame::VOnUpdate(float time, float elapsedTime)
00357 {
00358         int deltaMilliseconds = int(elapsedTime * 1000.0f);
00359         m_Lifetime += elapsedTime;
00360 
00361         BaseGame::VOnUpdate(time, elapsedTime);
00362 
00363         switch(m_State)
00364         {
00365         case BGS_LoadingGameEnvironment:
00366                 break;
00367                 
00368         case BGS_WaitingForPlayers:
00369                 if(g_pApp->m_pOptions->m_numAIs && m_Lifetime>5)//five seconds to wait for a human opponent
00370                 {
00371                         for (int i=0; i<g_pApp->m_pOptions->m_numAIs; ++i)
00372                         {
00373                                 shared_ptr<IGameView> gameView(GCC_NEW AITeapotView());
00374                                 VAddView(gameView);
00375                                 m_Lifetime = 0;
00376                         }
00377                 }
00378                 break;
00379 
00380         case BGS_Running:
00381                 break;
00382 
00383         default:
00384                 assert(0 && _T("Unrecognized state."));
00385         }
00386 
00387         // look in Chapter 15, page 563 for more on this bit of code
00388 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00389         if(m_pPhysics)
00390         {
00391                 m_pPhysics->VOnUpdate(deltaMilliseconds);
00392                 m_pPhysics->VSyncVisibleScene();
00393         }
00394 #endif 
00395 }

00403 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00404         if (m_RenderDiagnostics)
00405         {
00406                 m_pPhysics->VRenderDiagnostics();
00407         }
00408 #endif 
00409 }

00411 //
00412 // TeapotWarsGame::VRemoveActor                         - Chapter 19, page 751
00413 //
00414 void TeapotWarsGame::VRemoveActor(ActorId aid)
00415 {
00416         if( NULL!=VGetActor(aid).get() )
00417         {
00418 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00419                 m_pPhysics->VRemoveActor(aid);
00420 #endif 
00421                 TeapotWarsBaseGame::VRemoveActor(aid);
00422         }
00423         else
00424         {
00425                 assert(0 && _T("Unknown actor!"));
00426         }
00427 }
00428 
00429 //
00430 // TeapotWarsGame::VAddView                                     - Chapter 19, page 751
00431 //
00432 void TeapotWarsGame::VAddView(shared_ptr<IGameView> pView)
00433 {
00434         TeapotWarsBaseGame::VAddView(pView);
00435 
00436         TeapotParams tp;
00437         tp.m_Pos = m_StartPosition;
00438         tp.m_Length = 2.5;
00439         tp.m_ViewId = pView->VGetId();
00440 
00441         if (dynamic_cast<TeapotWarsGameView *>(&*pView))
00442                 tp.m_Color = g_Yellow;
00443         else if (dynamic_cast<NetworkGameView *>(&*pView))
00444                 tp.m_Color = g_Green;
00445         else if (dynamic_cast<AITeapotView *>(&*pView))
00446                 tp.m_Color = g_Red;
00447         else 
00448                 assert(0 && _T("Unexpected view type"));
00449 
00450         optional<ActorId> id = CreateTeapot(tp);
00451         m_StartPosition += Vec3(8, 0, 8);
00452 }

00455 //
00456 // TeapotWarsGame::VRegisterHit                         - Chapter 19, page 752
00457 //
00458 void TeapotWarsGame::VRegisterHit(const ActorId sphere, const ActorId teapot)
00459 {
00460         //Make the teapot dizzy if it hits
00461 
00462         const float hitForce = 8000000000.f;
00463 
00464 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00465         m_pPhysics->VApplyTorque(Vec3(0,1,0), hitForce, teapot);
00466 #endif 
00467 
00468         //everyone else gets a point, hahaha
00469         for( ActorScoreMap::iterator i=m_data.m_actorScores.begin()
00470                 ;i!=GetData().GetActorScores().end(); ++i )
00471         {
00472                 if( i->first!=teapot )
00473                 {
00474                         ++(i->second);
00475                 }
00476         }
00477 
00478         //VRemoveActor(sphere);
00479 }

00482 // VBuildInitialScene was added post-press.
00483 void TeapotWarsGame::VBuildInitialScene()
00484 {
00485         GridParams grid;
00486         grid.m_Color = g_Gray40;
00487         grid.m_Texture = "grid.dds";
00488         grid.m_Mat = Mat4x4::g_Identity;
00489         grid.m_Squares = 100;
00490 
00491         optional<ActorId> aid;
00492         aid = CreateGrid(grid);
00493         assert(aid.valid() && _T("Grid creation failed."));
00494 
00495         float dim = 5.0f;
00496         float angle = D3DX_PI / 16.0f;
00497         float height = sin(angle) * (dim / 2.0f);
00498         grid.m_Color = g_Red;
00499         grid.m_Squares = dim;
00500         grid.m_Mat.BuildRotationX(-angle);
00501         grid.m_Mat.SetPosition(Vec3(0.0f, height, -dim));
00502         aid = CreateGrid(grid);
00503         assert(aid.valid() && _T("Grid creation failed."));
00504 
00505         grid.m_Color = g_Blue;
00506         grid.m_Mat.BuildRotationX(angle);
00507         grid.m_Mat.SetPosition(Vec3(0.0f, height, dim));
00508         aid = CreateGrid(grid);
00509         assert(aid.valid() && _T("Grid creation failed."));
00510 
00511 }

00515 
00516 optional<ActorId> TeapotWarsGame::CreateGrid(GridParams const &p)
00517 {
00518         Mat4x4 mat;
00519         mat = p.m_Mat;
00520         shared_ptr<IActor> pGrid(new BaseActor(mat, "Grid"));
00521         VAddActor(pGrid, (ActorParams *)&p);
00522 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00523         m_pPhysics->VAddBox(Vec3(p.m_Squares/2.0f, 0.01f, p.m_Squares/2.0f), &*pGrid, SpecificGravity(PhysDens_Infinite), PhysMat_Slippery);
00524 #endif 
00525         return pGrid->VGetID();
00526 }
00527 
00528 //
00529 // TeapotWarsGame::CreateSphere                         - Chapter 19, page 750
00530 //
00531 optional<ActorId> TeapotWarsGame::CreateSphere(SphereParams const &p )
00532 {
00533         Mat4x4 mat;
00534         mat.BuildTranslation(p.m_Pos);
00535         shared_ptr<IActor> pSphere(new BaseActor(mat, "Sphere"));
00536         VAddActor(pSphere, (ActorParams *)&p);
00537 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00538         m_pPhysics->VAddSphere(p.m_Radius, &*pSphere, SpecificGravity(PhysDens_Pine), PhysMat_Bouncy);
00539 #endif 
00540         return pSphere->VGetID();
00541 }
00542 
00543 //
00544 // TeapotWarsGame::CreateTeapot                         - Chapter 19, page 750
00545 //
00546 optional<ActorId> TeapotWarsGame::CreateTeapot(TeapotParams const &p )
00547 {
00548         Mat4x4 mat;
00549         mat.BuildTranslation(p.m_Pos);
00550         shared_ptr<IActor> pTeapot(new BaseActor(mat, "Teapot"));
00551         VAddActor(pTeapot, (ActorParams *)&p);
00552 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00553         m_pPhysics->VAddBox(Vec3(p.m_Length, p.m_Length/3, p.m_Length), &*pTeapot, SpecificGravity(PhysDens_Water)*.8f, PhysMat_Slippery);
00554 #endif 
00555         optional<ActorId> id = pTeapot->VGetID();
00556         assert(id.valid() && "Teapots should always have valid IDs");
00557         return id;
00558 }
00559 
00560 optional<ActorId> TeapotWarsGame::CreateTestObject(TestObjectParams const &p )
00561 {
00562         Mat4x4 mat;
00563         mat.BuildTranslation(p.m_Pos);
00564 
00565         shared_ptr<IActor> pTestObject(new BaseActor(mat, "TestObject" ));
00566         VAddActor(pTestObject, (ActorParams *)&p);
00567 
00568 #ifndef DISABLE_PHYSICS
00569         m_pPhysics->VAddConvexMesh(TestObject::g_TestObjectVerts, 8, &*pTestObject, SpecificGravity(PhysDens_Pine), PhysMat_Normal);
00570 #endif 
00571         return pTestObject->VGetID();
00572 }
